name: ATID
seo_description: Fully affordable customizable Atid paper containers for cannabis flower and edibles. Customization options including shape, size, color, labelling and printing.
description: Protect your Flower, Edibles, Children, and our Planet with the patented, premium line of certified child-resistant, biodegradable cannabis paper containers.
advantages: Perfect for flowers, pre-rolls and edibles
Countless print, decoration and finishing options
first_description: ATID tubes have simple paper cores capped with paper disks, coated with a specially formulated barrier system that is kind to the environment while keeping products fresh.
second_description: We print your designs and branding directly onto the tube surface with extensive embellishment and paper finish options to add serious shelf appeal to your products.
third_description: There is nothing that comes close to ATID in terms of practicality, form, function and sustainability currently available on the market
